channel.title: AI Agent与代码生成工具成焦点 (2026/2/22)
channel.description: 本期新闻数据显示，AI Agent在代码开发和系统交互领域的应用显著加速。GitHub趋势中，全自动渗透测试系统Pentagi和Anthropic的Claude Code终端工具备受关注，同时Cloudflare和Apple也在积极推进Agent部署与端侧交互。学术界与业界则关注代码模型评测（Code2Bench）、底层芯片化（Taalas）及AI信任框架，显示出技术向垂直化和安全化发展的趋势。

item.title: AI Agent与代码生成工具成焦点
item.description: 本期新闻数据显示，AI Agent在代码开发和系统交互领域的应用显著加速。GitHub趋势中，全自动渗透测试系统Pentagi和Anthropic的Claude Code终端工具备受关注，同时Cloudflare和Apple也在积极推进Agent部署与端侧交互。学术界与业界则关注代码模型评测（Code2Bench）、底层芯片化（Taalas）及AI信任框架，显示出技术向垂直化和安全化发展的趋势。

item.title: anthropics/claude-code
item.description: Star anthropics / claude-code Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands. | 今日 +222 stars
item.author: anthropics

item.title: abhigyanpatwari/GitNexus
item.description: Sponsor Star abhigyanpatwari / GitNexus GitNexus: The Zero-Server Code Intelligence Engine - GitNexus is a client-side knowledge graph creator that runs entirely in your browser. Drop in a GitHub repo or ZIP file, and get an interactive knowledge graph wit a built in Graph RAG Agent. Perfect for code exploration | 今日 +132 stars
item.author: abhigyanpatwari

item.title: RichardAtCT/claude-code-telegram
item.description: Star RichardAtCT / claude-code-telegram A powerful Telegram bot that provides remote access to Claude Code, enabling developers to interact with their projects from anywhere with full AI assistance and session persistence. | 今日 +109 stars
item.author: RichardAtCT
